item.title: Garlic - Into the Mists
item.description: References Art by @kenha604. Pattern humanoid pattern and abs tutorial by Nazfx + self drafting Time Two months. Gallery Maker’s Notes Body Patterning I started with a store bought plushie from the spirit TV show, as it had the leg and hip definition I was looking to emulate. I tore it apart and copied the pattern, scanning it into the computer so that I could edit the lines using the path tool in gimp as per my standard workflow.
